## escaped tilde

my \~home

+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Column 1                                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| On OS X:\                                                                   |
| 1\. Open the Finder\                                                        |
| 2\. under the Go menu, select "Go To Folder"\                               |
| 3\. in the window that opens, type: \~/Library/Logs/CreativeCloud/CoreSync/ |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
